name: Microcrawl (ZPJ Interactive)
description:
Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way back through a dark fantasy world to get back home.

A Retro Dark Fantasy Narrative

A love letter to 1990s adventure games packed into a compact experience. No pixel hunting and no moon logic.

A handcrafted dark fantasy dream world drawn pixel by pixel

Capturing the feeling of the Commodore 64, in an accessible package

Explore a narrative driven tale of broken characters.

As you try to find your way home learn the story of the others who became trapped before you.
